data.title: Wonderful time searching for the right Tea
data.text: What a great afternoon searching for the right tea after a friend referred me to Walnut Street Tea Co. Their selection was amazing with loose leaf and bagged. Prices were very competitive. In addition to huge options in tea (and coffee) the specialty chocolates, caramels and other varieties made my day. Some caramels came from the Amish in the region and they were the best I've had. Quaint shop with character. It is now apart of my routine when I am in downtown Champaign, wont miss it!

data.title: Friendly help.
data.text: I have been to the Walnut Street Tea Co many times over the years.  They provide amazing help every time.

data.title: A delightful, reliable trove of delectable things
data.text: This is one of the best establishments in Champaign-Urbana. The owner carries a huge array of beautiful teas as well as anything remotely associated with drinking and serving tea. There is coffee as well, in addition to other gourmet delights, chocolates, tea towels - all pleasingly arranged in this wonderful nook on Walnut Street on the south edge of downtown Champaign. It is not to be missed.  And for finding special gifts, it is heaven!

data.title: An asset to the community!
data.text: Walnut Street Tea Company is a specialty store for tea (obviously), but also has fresh roasted coffee, bulk spices, and many specialty food items.  It's centrally located at the southern end of our small downtown.

data.title: Okay teas
data.text: I love tea and the smells from the tea here are wonderful but none of the teas we purchased were very flavorful. Just Okay nothing more.  They do have good coffee but I just can't get too excited about the place.

data.title: Taes, Coffees, Chocolates Cookies and More
data.text:
Great selection of Teas, Coffees, Chocolates Cookies and more.
Betty as a great little shop, bit cramped but lots to look through.
International Teas and Coffees
Foreign Cookies/Shortbreads
Chocolates from far and wide
And helpful to the max.
If you've never been, stop by and have a look
You won't be disappointed
Betty even has lots of Tea & Coffee making equipment and storage equipment.
Everything you could want under one small roof!!
